response.overview: In danger of what I'm not sure. Perhaps in danger of finding a story. Don't worry. They don't even come close. There is one bi-sex scene, one she-male encounter and three virtually unrelated boy-girl bouts. The quality ranges from dismal up to abysmal and couldn't get a rise out of the most desperate sex maniacs. The only connection between the segments is that people keep mentioning prison and one scene is actually set there. This was probably an omen for the directors.
response.title: Queens Of Danger
